boardgame.name: Star Trek: Attack Wing
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Star Trek: Attack Wing is a tactical space combat miniatures game, featuring pre-painted ships from the Star Trek Universe._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;By using the FlightPath maneuver system* (licensed from Fantasy Flight Games), players engage in exploration and combat, traversing sprawling Star Trek space maps made available via an in-store Organized Play program. As commander, players have the ability to customize, upgrade, and assign famous crewmembers to their fleets, which feature ships from the series' prominent empires and forces as well as special stats and abilities, and unique maneuvers on separate Combat Dials._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Star Trek: Attack Wing is a standalone game which uses the core rule set of FFGs' FlightPath game system with a Star Trek twist, but is not compatible with other FlightPath games from FFG. The FlightPath maneuver system used in Star Trek: Attack Wing is based on the original game design by Jason Little._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups

listing.notes: This is for the base set and all 8 released ships. 7 of the ships are still sealed.

This comes with all of wave 1 (starter box and one of each of the ships). Bought the game and didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t much care for it. It also won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t see enough playtime to warrant keeping it around. I did repaint one of the Klingon ships, and the Enterprise D.
Elite Attack Die and card - never played Command Tokens and card - never played Red Shirt Crew Upgrade - never played

So, I recently received the ST:AW items in trade and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m a bit disappointed in it compared to X-Wing. Everything is opened and complete, except for two ships which are unopened. 2x Core sets (only 1 box is included, contents of second box are inside) U.S.S. Reliant Expansion Pack (unopened) U.S.S. Enterprise Expansion Pack I.K.S. Gr’oth Expansion Pack I.K.S. Negh’var Expansion Pack I.R.W. Valdore Expansion Pack (unopened) R.I.S. Apnex Expansion Pack Kraxon Expansion Pack Gor Portas Expansion Pack Retail on them would be $200. If you buy them online at a discount through an online retailer, the cost would be $140. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m looking for $125 shipped in the US!
Movement templates +freebie. :)
Acrylic movement templates +freebie.
Out of shrink but components are unpunched/unplayed. Buyer pays $10 shipping flat rate- US shipping only-
Acrylic movement rulers + free item. If you would like the range finder add $5.50 to the price.
Acrylic movement rulers + free item. NOTE: If you would like the range finder add $5.50 to the price.

13 clear acrylic movement rulers + 1 range finder($23). For colored sets add $5 to the total cost($28). NOTE: Sets are not engraved but grooved for coloring, see blue set. Shipping should be possible to other countries. Just ask for a quote on shipping prices.
Bought this on accident, everything is as described. Elite Attack Die and card - never played Command Tokens and card - never played Red Shirt Crew Upgrade - never played

Reserved for David Millette (mille1212) as auction winner. This listing includes Star Trek: Attack Wing ($20) as well as Gor Portas ($8), I.K.S. Gr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;oth ($11), I.K.S. Negh_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;var ($11), I.R.W. Valdore ($9), U.S.S. Enterprise ($11), and U.S.S. Reliant ($8).

For Evil Wayne only. This sale has been auto-generated for the auction: [geekurl=/geeklist/173323/item/3213131#3213131]Item for Geeklist _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Yet Another Geekway Auction - Ending Tuesday May 13 9:00pm CDT._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; [/geekurl] Please do not purchase if you didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t win this auction.

Here_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a great chance to get into the game with a 3-ship set of Klingon, Romulan and Federation units, and a great space gaming mat! Base Set (USS Enterprise D, IRW Khazara, IKS Maht-h_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;a) PLUS: USS Reliant USS Enterprise IKS Gr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;oth* IKS Negh_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;var IRW Valdore IRW Praetus All ships include relevant cards and counters. ALSO INCLUDES: 3ft x 3ft (36in x 36in) Deep Space Vinyl Gaming Mat featuring a high definition and highly detailed space scene. Filled with star clusters and a striking colourful gas nebula. Printed on high quality 500gsm PVC vinyl using the very latest printing processes, the game mat is both durable and visually striking, that can be easily cleaned and maintained. The total size of the mat is 100cm x 100cm and features a bordered 3ft x 3ft (36in x 36in) play area (from contactgaming.co.uk). Note that this sale does not include any of the original packaging. All chits/ cards/ counters supplied bagged. * 1 flight peg missing. Price is for the lot, will not split.

Huge Collection Never Played over 40 Ships, Includes 2 base games, and many Rare Ships such as USS Yeager, USS Sutherland, Federation Attack Fighters, Hideki Class Attack Fighter, plus the two newest Blind Boosters for the Romulan, and Jem Hadar Attack Ships still in boxes. Includes Plano Carrying Case. Plus, Cut Out Display of Deep Space 9 with cards, Red Alert and Skilled Helmsman Card. Game has never been played and everything is in like new condition. Only taken out of packages. Buyer to pay exact shipping. This game has 12 Federation Ships, 3 Borg, 9 Dominion, 1 Vulcan, 8 Romulan, and 9 Klingon. Plus, the Deep Space 9 Overlay and cards. I can provide exact list of ships if needed. Collection Cost over $600. however, need to sell collection at this time.
Outer box corner is creased. Damage caused during shipping. Original shrink-wrap is still intact. All interior components are new and untouched. Shipped weight = 2.35 lbs.

This is a collection of 25 Federation / Klingon / Romulan STAW ships, plus a few organized play bonus bits. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s copy in that I haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t held on to duplicates of cards that I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t use more than one of. For instance, from the IKS Gr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;oth packs, there_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s only one Captain Koloth (because he_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s unique) and only one Target Lock E (because, again, unique), but all of the non-unique components are there in quantity (so all of the shield tokens and weapon upgrades, among others). Things are sorted and bagged, and the core set box remains, but the blister pack packaging is long gone. Included in this lot: Star Trek Attack Wing Core Set ◦ (Enterprise 1701-D, Maht-H_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;a, Khazara) Federation ships (10): ◦ Defiant (x2) ◦ Enterprise 1701 ◦ Enterprise 1701 Refit ◦ Equinox (x2) ◦ Excelsior ◦ Reliant (x2) ◦ Voyager Klingon ships (10): ◦ Gr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;oth (x5) ◦ Koraga (x2) ◦ Kronos One ◦ Negh_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;var ◦ Somraw Romulan ships (5): ◦ Apnex ◦ Gal Gath_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;thong ◦ Praetus ◦ Valdore (x2) Other bits: ◦ Gen Con Khan Singh promo card ◦ Dominion War OP1 Deep Space Nine (cardboard disc, not the big 3D model) ◦ Dominion War OP1 Elite Attack Die resource ◦ Dominion War OP3 Reinforcement Sideboard resource ◦ Dominion War OP4 Flagship Cards resource plus a Plano 5232 tackle box that holds all of the ships Buyer pays shipping (gut feeling estimate, $15 USPS within the US)

Ship to UK mainland only. includes Star Trek: Attack Wing – 3rd Wing Attack Ship Dominion Expansion Pack Star Trek: Attack Wing – I.K.S. Gr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;oth Expansion Pack Star Trek: Attack Wing – I.K.S. Gr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;oth Expansion Pack Star Trek: Attack Wing – U.S.S. Enterprise Expansion Pack Star Trek: Attack Wing – U.S.S. Reliant Expansion Pack

Auction sale

This listing includes the Star Trek Attack Wing -Base Set -I.R.W. Expansion Pack Includes miniatures, cards, tokens, templates, rulebook, dice. Does not include the outer boxes (game has been stored in a hard plastic container). All components are in very good condition. However, I repainted the Enterprise model. Not my best work but not far from the original paint job. Can provide pictures upon request. Shipping to the U.S.A. only (sorry everyone else).
